string-array.name: battenberg
string-array.item: The Memorial Tomb of Alexander I of Battenberg , better known as the Battenberg Mausoleum in Sofia is the mausoleum and final resting place of Prince Alexander I of Bulgaria (1857â€“1893), the first Head of State of modern Bulgaria. The building was built in 1897 designed by architect Hermann Maier, while the interior is decorated by the famous Bulgarian artist Haralampi Tachev. Battenberg was buried there in 1898.
Sofia, 81 Vasil Levski boulevard. \nLocation: 42.691536,23.33279 (Click to see on the map)
